SELECT ACT_ID, ADMIN_ID, ACT_TITLE, ACT_ADDRESS, ACT_DATE, ACT_END, ACT_CUR, ACT_MAX FROM ACTIVITIES WHERE 1=1
AND ACT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND ACT_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY ACT_ID DESC

SELECT R.*, A.ACT_TITLE FROM VOLUNTEER_REVIEWS R JOIN ACTIVITIES A ON R.ACT_ID = A.ACT_ID WHERE R.R_REMOVE = 0
AND A.ACT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND R.R_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND R.R_REVIEW LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACTIVITIES ( ACT_ID, ADMIN_ID, ACT_TITLE, ACT_ADDRESS, ACT_DATE, ACT_END, ACT_MAX, ACT_CUR, ACT_LAT, ACT_LON, ACT_LOAD, ACT_MONEY ) VALUES ( SEQ_ACTIVITIES.NEXTVAL, #{adminId}, #{actTitle}, #{actAddress}, #{actDate}, #{actEnd}, #{actMax}, 0, #{actLat}, #{actLon}, SYSDATE, #{actMoney} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.ACT_ID, A.ADMIN_ID, A.ACT_TITLE, A.ACT_ADDRESS, A.ACT_DATE, A.ACT_END, A.ACT_MAX, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIGNS S WHERE S.ACT_ID = A.ACT_ID) AS ACT_CUR, A.ACT_LAT, A.ACT_LON, A.ACT_LOAD, A.ACT_MONEY FROM ACTIVITIES A WHERE ACT_ID = #{actId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ACTIVITIES SET ACT_TITLE = #{actTitle}, ACT_ADDRESS = #{actAddress}, ACT_DATE = #{actDate}, ACT_END = #{actEnd}, ACT_MAX = #{actMax} WHERE ACT_ID = #{actId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM VOLUNTEER_BOARD_COMMENTS WHERE ACT_ID = #{actId} AND CMT_REMOVE = 0 ORDER BY CMT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOLUNTEER_BOARD_COMMENTS ( CMT_NO, ACT_ID, USER_ID, CMT_ANSWER, CMT_DATE, CMT_UPDATE, CMT_REMOVE ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENTS.NEXTVAL, #{actId}, #{userId}, #{cmtAnswer}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0 )
INSERT INTO SIGNS ( SIGNS_NO, ACT_ID, SIGNS_ID, SIGNS_WAIT, SIGNS_STATUS, SIGNS_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SIGNS.NEXTVAL, #{actId}, #{signsId}, 1, 0, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO VOLUNTEER_REVIEWS ( REVIEW_NO, ACT_ID, R_ID, R_TITLE, R_REVIEW, R_RATE, R_CREATE, R_UPDATE, R_REMOVE ) VALUES ( SEQ_VOL_REVIEWS.NEXTVAL, #{actId}, #{rId}, #{rTitle}, #{rReview}, #{rRate}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM VOLUNTEER_REVIEWS WHERE ACT_ID = #{actId} AND R_REMOVE = 0 ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT R.*, A.ACT_TITLE FROM VOLUNTEER_REVIEWS R JOIN ACTIVITIES A ON R.ACT_ID = A.ACT_ID WHERE R.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE VOLUNTEER_REVIEWS SET R_TITLE = #{rTitle}, R_REVIEW = #{rReview}, R_RATE = #{rRate}, R_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
UPDATE ACTIVITIES SET ACT_RATE = ( SELECT NVL(AVG(R_RATE), 0) FROM VOLUNTEER_REVIEWS WHERE ACT_ID = #{actId} AND R_REMOVE = 0 ) WHERE ACT_ID = #{actId}
